comments: This is the configuration file for unit-test.sh

tests.cmd: ./script-under-test.sh 1 this test exits with a warning
./script-under-test.sh 2 this test exits with an error

tests.notes: This script name has a typo
tests.cmd: ./script-under-te5t.sh 2 this test exits with an error

tests.notes: string return type - successful execution of failure with warning
string return type - successful execution of failure with error
string return type - failed execution - expecting Error - gets OK
string return type - failed execution - expecting OK - gets Warning
